question:
Dimas Do you have favorite novels?    Rino Thave two favorite novels. The llounted House
and The Secret Place
Dimas What kind of novel are they?
Rino The Hounted House is a horror novel, and
The Secret Place is a detective story
Dimas Which one is thicker?
Rino · The Haunted House has 50 pages, but the
Secret Place has 75 pages,
Dimas How much did you buy those novels?
Rino : The Haunted House is Rp. 35.000, and The
Secret Place is Rp. 125.000
Dimas: I like detective story, too. May I borrow yours
sometimes?
Rino Certainly! You may come to my house because
I have more interesting story books to read
26. Who likes detective story?
A Dimas.
C None
B. Rino
D. Dimas and Rino​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Dimas

Penjelasan:

karena di situ Dimas bilang "i like detective story'"

maaf kalau salah ya, semangat belajar nya

related_questions.question:
Quiz ;)    Most fish use their side, back, and tail fins for swimming. Fins (1) … movable, fanlike parts. A fish (2) … through the water by swinging its tail fins back and forth. A fish uses (3) … other fins to steer (4) … to stop. Sometimes the other fins also help it go fast through the water.
 Most fishes have bodies shaped like a torpedo. Their bodies are pointed at the head and at the tail. This streamlined body helps fish speed through water. Sailfish can swim as (5) … as 70 miles per hour (110 kilometers per hour).
(6) … fish have unusual shapes. Rays have flat, disc-shaped bodies. Large fins like wings go out from a ray’s head. To swim, rays flap the fins.
 Most fish also have swim bladders. They fill their swim bladders (7) … air. Their air-filled swim bladders act like life jackets. They keep the fish from sinking to the bottom.

Perintah : Lengkapi kalimat Rumpang menjadi kalimat efektif.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Most fish use their side, back, and tail fins for swimming. Fins (1) are movable, fanlike parts. A fish (2)swims through the water by swinging its tail fins back and forth. A fish uses (3) its other fins to steer (4) its body to stop. Sometimes the other fins also help it go fast through the water.

Most fishes have bodies shaped like a torpedo. Their bodies are pointed at the head and at the tail. This streamlined body helps fish speed through water. Sailfish can swim as (5)fast as 70 miles per hour (110 kilometers per hour).

(6)many fish have unusual shapes. Rays have flat, disc-shaped bodies. Large fins like wings go out from a ray’s head. To swim, rays flap the fins.

Most fish also have swim bladders. They fill their swim bladders (7) contain air. Their air-filled swim bladders act like life jackets. They keep the fish from sinking to the bottom.

  • Lebih simpelnya jawabannya!!!
  • 1.are
  • 2.swims
  • 3.its
  • 4.its body
  • 5.fast
  • 6.many
  • 7.contain

*

related_questions.question:
Mrs. Sony    : Can you do the washing-up, please?
Mariam : I'm sorry, I can't. I have to do my homework.
Mrs. Sony
: Oh. Well, go and start your homework now:
Mariam : Mum ... can I go to the cinema with Kerry later?
Mrs. Sony
: Sorry, you can't. You have to do your homework!
Mariam : But I haven't got much homework to do.
Mrs. Sony : First do the washing-up and your homework!
Mariam : Of course! But can I go out with her after that?
Mrs. Sony
: Mmm ... OK. Yes, you can.
mariam:thanks, mum

artinya apa ka?? tolong jawab yaa​

answers.answer:
Nyonya Sony

: Bisakah kamu mencucinya?

Mariam: Maaf, saya tidak bisa. Aku harus mengerjakan pekerjaaan rumahku.

Nyonya Sony

: Oh. Nah, pergi dan mulai pekerjaan rumah kamu sekarang:

Mariam : Bu... bolehkah aku pergi ke bioskop dengan Kerry nanti?

Nyonya Sony

: Maaf, kau tidak bisa. Kau harus melakukan pekerjaan rumah Kau!

Mariam: Tapi saya tidak punya banyak pekerjaan rumah yang harus dilakukan.

Mrs Sony : Pertama lakukan cucian dan pekerjaan rumahmu!

Mariam: Tentu saja! Tapi bisakah aku keluar setelah itu?

Nyonya Sony

: Mmm oke. Ya kamu bisa.

mariam: terima kasih, ibu

semoga bermanfaat.

Awalnya Mrs Sonny meminta Mariam mencuci, tapi Mariam menolak permintaan Mrs Sonny karena Mariam harus mengerjakan tugas (PR).

Mariam juga meminta ijin kepada Mrs Sony untuk pergi ke bioskop bersama Kerry, awalnya Mrs Sonny menolak, tetapi jika Mariam mencuci dan mengerjakan tugas Rumah, maka Mrs Sonny mengijinkan Mariam ke bioskop
